channel.title: 317 client
channel.description: my client has snow in it... i want to get rid of it. and also the gates are like helmets and not a gate. how to fix that too. thanks! sorry this is so choppy i am in a rush.

item.title: 317 client
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

it’s you cache, someone replaced all your textures (with a tool like tom’s cache editor) with white pictures or white. the snow will stay unless you can repack your cache, so in other words either get new pictures and repack your cache or get a new client

Read full topic
